channel.title: Climate Impacts on Beichen Zhang
channel.description: Recent content in Climate Impacts on Beichen Zhang

item.title: AGU2022 ðŸŒŽ
item.description: The preliminary research on studying the impacts of climate extremes, particularly droughts, on the increased frequency will be presented as a poster at the session: H32N - Causal Inference in Hydrology: Inter-comparisons, Applications, and Future Avenues at 9:00 AM - 12:30 PM on Wednesday, December 14. Welcome to stop by and discuss with me. If you are interested in this research and have any further questions or comments, please also feel free to contact me.

item.title: AGU2023 ðŸŒŽ
item.description: The interdisciplinary research on predicting and assessing complex drought impacts using tje explainable ML will be presented as a talk at the session: 8A.3 Trustworthy AI at 4:15 PM - 4:30 PM on Tuesday, January 10. Welcome to stop by and join the session! If you are interested in this research and have any further questions or comments, please also feel free to contact me. Slides of the presentation at AMS 2023 (because of the size of the file, please wait for seconds to load the PDF below)
